name: dacn-web-quanly-hoatdongrenluyen
description: Hệ thống quản lý hoạt động rèn luyện cho sinh viên

scripts.setup: node -e "console.log('Please run setup.bat (Windows) or ./setup.sh (Linux/macOS) for automatic setup')"
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && npm install && docker-compose up -d && npx prisma migrate dev && npm run seed
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev

author: ThLin57
